infoFields.name: client_idx
infoFields.caption: Cliente
data: SELECT id, client FROM clients ORDER BY 2

infoFields.name: account_idx
infoFields.caption: Cuenta
data: SELECT id, name, client_id FROM accounts a ORDER BY name;

infoFields.name: unit_idx
infoFields.caption: Unit
data: SELECT u.id as unit_id, un.name as unit_name, account_id, device_id FROM units as u INNER JOIN units_names as un on un.id = u.name_id ORDER BY account_id, unit_name
